<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Run this fix script to create a default record on user display configuration table  for upgrading customers.</description>
        <name>Populate default field for user config</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var DISPLAYCONFIGTABLE = 'sn_cd_user_display_configuration'; 
var displayConfigGR = new GlideRecord(DISPLAYCONFIGTABLE); 
displayConfigGR.addQuery('is_default', true);
displayConfigGR.setLimit(1);
displayConfigGR.query();
if(!displayConfigGR.next())
	generateDefaultRecord();

function generateDefaultRecord(){
	var userDisplayGr = new GlideRecord(DISPLAYCONFIGTABLE);
	userDisplayGr.initialize(); 
	userDisplayGr.setValue('name','Default'); 
	userDisplayGr.setValue('is_default', true);
	userDisplayGr.setValue('active', true);
	userDisplayGr.setValue('table','sys_user'); 
	userDisplayGr.setValue('date','sys_created_on');
	userDisplayGr.insert();
}
]]></script>
